div.p: Determine if specified simple variants are present, absent, or unknown. If any specified variant instance that passes the filters is present, then presence=present. If region was studied and no variant was found, then presence=absent. If region was not studied, or was studied but deemed uncallable, then presence=unknown. (The find-subject-specific-variants-simple operation simply reports if a variant is present or not, whereas this operation reports present/absent/unknown).
